name: Anomaly in "Average cycle time" where "IssueType" is "Bug"
query: SELECT "IssueType", AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time)) - (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) AS "Average cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500
